Are you affiliated with an organized religion?
 
 Have you ever prayed?
 
 
 Personally, I am not affiliated with any religious organization. I don't need them, and I am not compelled by any of them, I don't care for the hateful religions of the west, nor the apathetic and ignorant religions of the east. I was not raised by a religious family, and prayer hasn't really been a part of my upbringing at all. However, I do occasionally engage myself in a prayer like act. I sometimes, when I hope for something very much, express my hope to myself in terms of a plea outwards to somewhere or someone.

Are you affiliated with an organized religion?

 Sort of on my way to being with one.
 

 Have you ever prayed?

 Yep.
